str2: In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Second; with the article: in the second place, for the second time. As the compare of duo; second.
Joseph, a proper name. Of Hebrew origin; Joseph, the name of seven Israelites.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To recognize; pass: To be made known, cause myself to be recognized. Middle voice from ana and gnorizo; to make known.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: He, she, it, they, them, same. From the particle au; the reflexive pronoun self, used of the third person, and of the other persons.
A brother, member of the same religious community, especially a fellow-Christian. A brother near or remote.
Joseph, a proper name. Of Hebrew origin; Joseph, the name of seven Israelites.
Offspring, family, race, nation, kind. From ginomai; 'kin'.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A prolongation and middle voice form of a primary verb; to cause to be, i.e. to become, used with great latitude.
Apparent, clear, visible, manifest; adv: clearly. From phaino; shining, i.e. Apparent; neuter publicly, externally.
Pharaoh, the title of ancient Egyptian kings. Of foreign origin; Pharao, an Egyptian king.
